extensionDescription.message: Send messages with Ctrl+Enter and insert newlines with Enter on various websites.

reportIssue.description: Bug Report and Feature Request link

noDomainsConfigured.message: No domain configurations saved yet. Visit a site and use the popup to configure.

resetAllConfirm.message: All settings will be reset. Are you sure you want to reset?

resetConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset settings for $DOMAIN$?

noDomainAvailable.description: Message when domain is not available

specialPageNotSupported.message: This extension does not work on this page.
specialPageNotSupported.description: Explanation that extension does not work on special pages

onboardingDescription.message: By default, 'Enter' behavior on all websites is changed from 'Send' to 'New Line'.

onboardingSiteToggle.message: In either mode, you can individually toggle the extension ON/OFF from the popup.

onboardingDefaultEnabled.message: You can also change to 'Default OFF (Whitelist Mode)' from the settings.
onboardingDefaultEnabled.description: Explanation that extension is ON by default

onboardingAdvancedSettings.message: * Some sites (like Twitter, Google Search) have different default settings.

optionsDescription.message:
This extension prevents 'Enter to Send' on websites and changes it to 'Ctrl+Enter' to send.
Select your preferred activation mode (Whitelist/Blacklist) and configure per-site settings as needed.

supportDescription.message: If you find this extension useful, consider supporting the developer:

whatsNewDescription.message: Check out the latest updates and improvements!

supportWarningTitle.message: ⚠️ Warning: Please, absolutely do not click!

supportWarningMessage1.message: Even if you think this extension is "nice" or "helpful", please do not click the buttons below.

supportWarningMessage2.message: Do not support even with just a cup of coffee.

supportWarningMessage6.message: along with support is absolutely not allowed.

supportWarningMessage7.message: Do you understand? Absolutely do not click!!

activationModeDescription.message: Choose how the extension is activated on websites.

blacklistModeDesc.message: Enabled on all sites by default. Disable specific sites.

whitelistModeDesc.message: Disabled on all sites by default. Enable specific sites.

activationModeChangeConfirm.message: Changing the activation mode will affect how the extension works on all websites. Continue?
activationModeChangeConfirm.description: Confirmation message when changing activation mode
